name: EQL Seongsu
summary: Fashion and lifestyle concept store with fast popup turnover.

name: Lowkey Seongsu
summary: Natural wine-focused spot with a refined and calm mood.

name: Hebe Coffee
summary: Less crowded roastery with a minimal interior vibe.

name: Chapter One Hannam
summary: Large furniture and object showroom with strong spatial direction.

name: Oasis Hannam
summary: Cafe by day and wine bar at night with bright natural light.

name: Downtowner Hannam
summary: Known for avocado burgers, casual but still stylish.

name: Hell Cafe Yeonnam
summary: Dark-roast specialty coffee with a signature moody tone.

name: Saseum Bookstore
summary: Indie publishing and graphics-focused bookstore with small exhibitions.

name: Tailor Coffee Yeonnam
summary: Brown-toned interior and strong dessert lineup.

name: All That Jazz Mullae
summary: Live-performance jazz bar with stronger night atmosphere.

name: Ofcoha
summary: Gallery-style cafe with frequent photo and exhibition collaborations.

name: Boan 1942
summary: Renovated historic building turned into a mixed cultural space.

name: Susu Coffee
summary: Hanok-view cafe that is usually less packed than major hotspots.

name: CNP Gallery Cafe
summary: Exhibition-based cafe with a quiet work-friendly vibe.

name: Midnight Blue
summary: Natural wine-focused bar with generous table spacing.

name: Daelim Changgo
summary: First-generation Seongsu warehouse complex space, reactivated around exhibitions and performances.
price: Free to paid depending on event

name: LCDC Seoul
summary: Curated space combining fashion, exhibitions, and lifestyle.
price: Free to paid depending on exhibition

name: Layer 41
summary: Popup and fashion-brand experimentation space with fast floor turnover.

name: Ader Error Space Seongsu
summary: Brand architecture space presenting fashion like an exhibition.

name: Musinsa Terrace Seongsu
summary: Retail space for brand collaboration exhibitions and hands-on experiences.

name: Studio Concrete
summary: Archive-style venue combining exhibitions, publishing, and fashion.

name: D Museum (Yongsan)
summary: Immersive exhibition-focused museum with fast trend-responsive staging.

name: Sewoon-Daelim 3F Zone
summary: Cluster of creative studios and exhibition spaces above the electronics market.
closed: Varies by store (many closed on Sunday)

name: Eulji Art Center
summary: Independent exhibition and performance venue rooted in Euljiro metalwork alleys.

name: Paper Press Seoul
summary: Graphic and publishing-based venue for exhibitions and workshops.
price: Free to paid depending on event

name: Sounds Hannam
summary: Architecturally strong mixed-cultural space and brand experimentation stage.

name: Piknic (Namchang-dong)
summary: Renovated industrial-building exhibition space with strong international curation.

name: Platform-L Contemporary Art Center
